perturbation.original_text: Consistent with paragraph 15(c) of the Agreement, Licensee shall forfeit the Guarantee paid to date of ***** dollars (US$*****), and shall immediately pay the remaining Guarantee of ***** dollars (US$*****), equaling a total Guarantee payment by Licensee to Fox of ***** dollars (US$*****) ("Guarantee Forfeiture Payment").
perturbation.changed_text: Consistent with paragraph 15(c) of the Agreement, Licensee shall forfeit the Guarantee paid to date of ***** dollars (US$*****), but the forfeiture may be waived at Fox's discretion, and the remaining Guarantee of ***** dollars (US$*****) may be subject to negotiation, equaling a total Guarantee payment by Licensee to Fox of ***** dollars (US$*****) ("Guarantee Forfeiture Payment").
